p: Eighty‐eight to 97% of persons aware of their HIV diagnosis in the intervention arms were on ART (UNAIDS “second 90”) by trial end in three of the four UTT studies (Figure 1B). In the TasP study, linkage to care remained a challenge, particularly among youth, those with new HIV diagnosis, higher education and those living farther away from clinic, reflecting barriers also reported by others 19, 20.
